items.name: The Coastal Project – Time Tracking & Payroll System
items.description: Custom-built time tracking and payroll management system developed for a short-term rental company in the United States to replace an existing third-party solution.
items.summary: Designed and implemented a custom time tracking platform to replace a third-party system, providing better control over employee hours, payroll processing, and operational reporting for a short-term rental company.
items.impact: Centralized employee time and payroll data, reduced manual payroll processing, and lowered annual software subscription costs by approximately 60%, generating significant operational savings.
highlights: Employee time tracking and shift logging
Payroll receipts and employee payment management
Replacement of a third-party time tracking system
Backend APIs for time, payroll, and reporting modules
Reduced dependency on external SaaS tools

items.name: Mobile App – Institutional Asset Management
items.description: Full-stack mobile application developed to manage, identify, and track institutional assets using mobile devices.
items.summary: Designed and implemented a full-stack Android mobile application to manage institutional assets, allowing users to authenticate securely, identify assets using the mobile device, and synchronize data with a backend system.
items.impact: Improved asset visibility and control by enabling real-time asset identification, offline data access, and centralized synchronization with backend services.
highlights: Mobile device used as an asset identification reader
Data synchronization with backend via REST APIs

items.name: Atlas Identity
items.description: Implemented a zero-trust auth system with policy-driven access control, token introspection, and rotating keys.
items.summary: Zero-trust auth service with token introspection, rotating keys, and policy-based access control.
items.impact: Reduced auth latency by 41% while supporting 12M monthly users.

items.name: SignalWirehouse
items.description: Shipped a streaming ETL pipeline that transforms IoT telemetry into analytics-ready tables with strict data quality gates.
items.summary: Streaming ETL pipeline that transforms IoT telemetry into analytics-ready tables in near real time.

items.summary: Payments orchestration layer with fraud scoring, provider failover, and settlement reporting.
